long_description: Wear the women's Haiku Wander Convertible Bag crossbody as a messenger bag, or, if you want your hands and arms completely free, switch the strap to backpack mode and you're off! Adjustable strap unclips at one end, slips through a ring at center back, and reclips to form a simple backpack. Vertical-style bag has multiple zippered pockets, including one on the outside flap, as well as slip-in pockets and an organizer panel. Internal water bottle pocket keeps bottle upright; key fob and pocket stows keys where you can find them easily. Haiku Wander Convertible Bag is made of recycled material.
short_description: Wear the women's Haiku Wander Convertible Bag crossbody as a messenger bag, or, if you want your hands and arms completely free, switch the strap to backpack mode and you're off!
